name: browser_select_option
description: Select an option in a dropdown. Matching priority: exact value match, then exact label match, then partial label match. The snapshot now shows available options for select elements.

element.description: Human-readable element description used to obtain permission to interact with the element

ref.description: Exact target element reference from the page snapshot

values.description: Array of values to select. Matches against option value first, then label text, then partial label. Use exact values from the snapshot options list when available.

viewId.description: Target browser tab ID. If omitted, uses the last interacted tab.
